mutants.original_line: probabilities = [d * f / sum_products for d, f in zip(D, F)]
mutants.mutated_line: probabilities = [d * f * sum_products for (d, f) in zip(D, F)]
mutants.code:
def calculate_faulty_snack_probability(N, D, F):
    sum_products = sum((d * f for (d, f) in zip(D, F)))
    probabilities = [d * f * sum_products for (d, f) in zip(D, F)]
    max_index = probabilities.index(max(probabilities))
    max_probability = max(probabilities)
    formatted_probability = f'{max_probability:.3f}'
    return (max_index, formatted_probability)
